name: mb-digest-api
description: Digest API for Message Broker use.
author: Darren Lee <dlee@dosomething.org>

scripts.postinstall: node -e "var modelpath='../model'; var dstmodelpath='node_modules/model'; var srcpath='../lib'; var dstsrcpath='node_modules/lib'; var cfgpath='../config'; var dstcfgpath='node_modules/config'; var fs=require('fs'); fs.exists(dstmodelpath,function(modelexists){if(!modelexists){fs.symlinkSync(modelpath, dstmodelpath,'dir');}});fs.exists(dstsrcpath,function(srcexists){if(!srcexists){fs.symlinkSync(srcpath, dstsrcpath,'dir');}});fs.exists(dstcfgpath,function(cfgexists){if(!cfgexists){fs.symlinkSync(cfgpath, dstcfgpath,'dir');}});"
